data.title: Nice Shady Area
data.text: This is a nice and shady area... Good for walking dogs, jogging, or riding your horse :D There is a playground right near so that is definitely worth the walk ;)  I live right on the trail that leads to it so OF COURSE I LIKE IT LOL

data.title: Wonder Place To Walk In The Woods
data.text: This park is located on Serrano Creek trail, and is nestled against the creek in a heavily wooded area.  You will see dog walkers, runner and people on horseback along these paths.  Very close to home, and a quick way to be one with nature.

data.title: nice eucalyptus tree park, trade mark of Lake Forest
data.text:
Nice park with tall eucalyptus trees, quiet place to take a walk in a hot summer day in the shade.  There are also tables for picnic.
The city insists that people clean up their dogs waste, yet the park allows people with horses to leave their waste all over.  It would be a much better place without the horse sh...Wish the city of Lake Forest would do something to keep this nice park clean.
